summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.5 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1087 m), feels like temperature (up 2.4°C), outside temperature (up 2.1°C), and inside temperature (up 2.0°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 400.3m higher than yesterday, 477.3m lower than the past week, 1087.0m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 765m minimum and 2220m maximum, with an average of 1665.9m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 2140m and 2750m.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, the air will feel wet and humid. Drizzle or light rain possible, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and bright sunshine will dominate the day. The weather may change rapidly and become worse.
